Functions

01000_TEE_GetPropertyName
[GP_010_Properties]

Functions

 TestCase_GC001_Start3Enumerators ()
 TestCase_GC002_ItemNotFound ()
 TestCase_BC003_enumeratorNull ()
 TestCase_BC004_bufferNull ()

Detailed Description

Description:
: Resets a property enumerator.

TEE_Result TEE_GetPropertyName( TEE_PropSetHandle enumerator, [outstring] void* nameBuffer, size_t* nameBufferLen );

For this test, we will need at least one TA.

Pre: Open a session to a GPTA.

Post: Close session and check that it succeeds.

Function Documentation

TestCase_GC001_Start3Enumerators (  )
Trusted Applications dependencies:
05040000000000000000000000000001 6b28a6d436fe5fb9b5ed59cba151a0fc
Pre Conditions:
05040000000000000000000000000001.[drbin/tlbin] is loaded.
Focus:
Test the functionality of TEE_GetPropertyName().
Test Steps:
Call TEE_AllocatePropertyEnumerator to get a new enumerator for TEE_PROPSET_CURRENT_TA Call TEE_AllocatePropertyEnumerator to get a new enumerator for TEE_PROPSET_CURRENT_CLIENT Call TEE_AllocatePropertyEnumerator to get a new enumerator for TEE_PROPSET_TEE_IMPLEMENTATION For each of the 3 enumerators:
  • Call TEE_GetPropertyName() with length 0, and buffer=NULL which should return TEE_ERROR_SHORT_BUFFER and the length needed for the name
  • allocate a buffer using the length from the previous call
  • call TEE_GetPropertyName() with the newly-allocated buffer Compare each of the three names that were retrieved to verify that they are all different Call TEE_FreePropertyEnumerator() on each of the previously-allocated enumerators
Post Conditions:
none
Manual Execution:
No
Trustonic Test Suite Testcase:
Yes
Final Device Testcase:
No
Extensive Testcase:
Yes
Basic Testcase:
No
Quick Testcase:
No
Minimum Product Version required for this testcase:
400A
Test ID:
GP_010_Properties.01000_TEE_GetPropertyName.GC001_Start3Enumerators
TestCase_GC002_ItemNotFound (  )
Trusted Applications dependencies:
05040000000000000000000000000001 6b28a6d436fe5fb9b5ed59cba151a0fc
Pre Conditions:
05040000000000000000000000000001.[drbin/tlbin] is loaded.
Focus:
Test the functionality of TEE_GetPropertyName().
Test Steps:
Call TEE_AllocatePropertyEnumerator to get a new enumerator for TEE_PROPSET_CURRENT_TA Call TEE_StartPropertyEnumerator() Call TEE_GetNextProperty() until it returns TEE_ERROR_ITEM_NOT_FOUND Allocate a large name buffer Call TEE_GetPropertyName() and verify that it returns TEE_ERROR_ITEM_NOT_FOUND and that it does not modify the length or name buffer Call TEE_FreePropertyEnumerator()
Post Conditions:

TestCase_BC004_bufferNull (  )
Trusted Applications dependencies:
05040000000000000000000000000001 6b28a6d436fe5fb9b5ed59cba151a0fc
Pre Conditions:
05040000000000000000000000000001.[drbin/tlbin] is loaded.
Focus:
Attempt to get the property name using a null name buffer
Test Steps:
Call TEE_AllocatePropertyEnumerator to get a new enumerator for TEE_PROPSET_CURRENT_TA Call TEE_StartPropertyEnumerator() Call TEE_GetPropertyName() with null as the buffer pointer and a large length, which should cause a TA panic
